tags.name: LT 27 View Incidents Hazards/LT-15 Incident Details

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website
Then I should see the LiveTraffic Website Home page
When I choose Hide map options

Then user should see traffic arrangement accordians
| Traffic_Arrangment_Accordian |
| Special Event Clearways |
| Road and Lane Closures |
| Speed Limit Reductions |
| Download Maps |

And user should be able to open "Special Event Clearways" accordian
| Special_Event_Clearways |
| Special event clearways are strict no parking zones |
And user should be able to close "Special Event Clearways" accordian

And user should be able to open "Road and Lane Closures" accordian
| Road_and_Lane_Closures |
| TURRAMURRA |
| FROM 5:00AM TO 3:00PM |
| Karuah Road between Eastern Road and Turramurra Avenue |
And user should be able to close "Road and Lane Closures" accordian

And user should be able to open "Speed Limit Reductions" accordian
| Speed_Limit_Reductions |
| The speed limit will be temporarily reduced for the safety of cyclists |
| SPEED LIMIT REDUCED FROM 90KM/H TO 60KM/H: |
| 7am to 10.45am |
And user should be able to close "Speed Limit Reductions" accordian

And user should be able to open "Download Maps" accordian
| Download_Maps |
| Bobbin Head Cycle Classic - Mona Vale Rd Clearway map (1060 KB) |
And user should be able to close "Download Maps" accordian
